description: APPLICATION TO DETERMINE WHETHER PRIOR APPROVAL IS REQUIRED IN RESPECT OF THE PROPOSED INSTALLATION OF A 20M HIGH TELECOMMUNICATIONS  MONOPOLE AND ASSOCIATED CABINETS.
decision_conditions: Reason : 1 - The proposal, due to its siting, appearance, height and scale would be visually intrusive and detrimental to the open character of the streetscene and surrounding area contrary to Policies DM D1, DM D2 and DM D6 of the Merton Sites and Policies Plan 2014.

Reason : 2 - The proposal, due to its siting and position on the public pavement would result in a disruption to the free-flow of pedestrian movement and would cause an un-safe environment for pedestrians due to the close proximity of the existing cycle lane,, contrary to Policy DM T5 of the Merton Sites and Policies Plan 2014.

Reason : 3 - The proposal, due to its siting, appearance, height and scale would be visually intrusive and lead to a dilution of the visual amenity of the planned public open space under planning permission 17/P1721, contrary to Policies DM D1, DM D2 and DM D6 of the Merton Sites and Policies Plan 2014.

Reason : 4 - INFORMATIVE: The drawing numbers which this decision relates are 002 SITE LOCATION PLAN, 005 CHERRY PICKER & CRANE LOCATION, 100 EXISTING SITE PLAN, 150 EXISTING ELEVATION A, 210 PROPOSED H3G SITE PLAN, 260 PROPOSED H3G ELEVATION.
